sales_creditmemo.description: This table contains information about credit memos issued for orders

data.description: The primary key of the table, unique identifier for each credit memo.
Identifier for the order to which this credit memo is associated.
The status of the credit memo (e.g., open, closed, partially_refunded).
The state of the credit memo (e.g., new, processing, closed).
Unique sequential credit memo identifier.
Identifier for the store where the order was placed.
Identifier for the customer who placed the order.
Base grand total of the credit memo.
Grand total of the credit memo.
Base positive adjustment amount for the credit memo.
Positive adjustment amount for the credit memo.
Base tax amount for the credit memo.
Tax amount for the credit memo.
Shipping amount for the credit memo.
Base shipping amount for the credit memo.
Discount amount applied to the credit memo.
Base discount amount applied to the credit memo.
Tax amount for shipping on the credit memo.
Base tax amount for shipping on the credit memo.
Negative adjustment amount for the credit memo.
Base negative adjustment amount for the credit memo.
Date and time when the credit memo was created.
Date and time when the credit memo was last updated.
Unique identifier for the credit memo.
Identifier for the invoice associated with the credit memo, if applicable.
Identifier for the transaction associated with the credit memo.
Base currency code for the credit memo.
Currency code for the order associated with the credit memo.
Currency code for the store where the order was placed.
Quantity of items refunded by the credit memo.
Label for the status of the credit memo.
Label for the state of the credit memo.
